verses.verse: The elders <WG4245> which are among <WG1722> you I exhort, <WG3870> who <WG3588> am also <WG2532> an elder, <WG4850> and a witness <WG3144> of the sufferings <WG3804> of Christ, <WG5547> and also <WG2532> a partaker <WG2844> of the glory <WG1391> that shall be revealed: <WG601>

Feed <WG4165> the flock <WG4168> of God <WG2316> which is among <WG1722> you, taking the oversight <WG1983> thereof, not by constraint, <WG317> but willingly; <WG1596> not for filthy <WG147> lucre, <WG147> but of a ready <WG4289> mind; <WG4290>
Neither <WG3366> as being lords <WG2634> over <WG2634> God's <WG2316> heritage, <WG2819> but being <WG1096> ensamples <WG5179> to the flock. <WG4168>
And when the chief <WG750> Shepherd <WG750> shall appear, <WG5319> you shall receive <WG2865> a crown <WG4735> of glory <WG1391> that fades <WG262> not away.

Likewise, <WG3668> you younger, <WG3501> submit <WG5293> yourselves to the elder. <WG4245> Yes, <WG1161> all <WG3956> of you be subject <WG5293> one <WG240> to another, <WG240> and be clothed <WG1463> with humility: <WG5012> for God <WG2316> resists <WG498> the proud, <WG5244> and gives <WG1325> grace <WG5485> to the humble. <WG5011>
Humble <WG5013> yourselves therefore <WG3767> under <WG5259> the mighty <WG2900> hand <WG5495> of God, <WG2316> that he may exalt <WG5312> you in due <WG2398> time: <WG2540>
Casting <WG1977> all <WG3956> your <WG5216> care <WG3308> on him; for he cares <WG3199> for you.

Be sober, <WG3525> be vigilant; <WG1127> because <WG3754> your <WG5216> adversary <WG476> the devil, <WG1228> as a roaring <WG5612> lion, <WG3023> walks <WG4043> about, <WG4043> seeking <WG2212> whom <WG5101> he may devour: <WG2666>

Whom <WG3739> resist <WG436> steadfast <WG4731> in the faith, <WG4102> knowing <WG1492> that the same <WG846> afflictions <WG3804> are accomplished <WG2005> in your <WG5216> brothers <WG81> that are in the world. <WG2889>

But the God <WG2316> of all <WG3956> grace, <WG5485> who <WG3588> has called <WG2564> us to his eternal <WG166> glory <WG1391> by Christ <WG5547> Jesus, <WG2424> after that you have suffered <WG3958> a while, <WG3641> make <WG2675> you perfect, <WG2675> establish, <WG4741> strengthen, <WG4599> settle <WG2311> you.
To him be glory <WG1391> and dominion <WG2904> for ever <WG165> and ever. <WG165> Amen. <WG281>

By Silvanus, <WG4610> a faithful <WG4103> brother <WG80> to you, as I suppose, <WG3049> I have written <WG1125> briefly, <WG1223> <WG3641> exhorting, <WG3870> and testifying <WG1957> that this <WG5026> is the true <WG227> grace <WG5485> of God <WG2316> wherein <WG1519> <WG3757> you stand. <WG2476>
The church <WG1577> that is at <WG1722> Babylon, <WG897> elected <WG4899> together <WG4899> with you, salutes <WG782> you; and so does Marcus <WG3138> my son. <WG5207>
Greet <WG782> you one <WG240> another <WG240> with a kiss <WG5370> of charity. <WG26> Peace <WG1515> be with you all <WG3956> that are in Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424> Amen. <WG281>
